title: Vaibhav Diamond Haaram Set with Navratna Accents - A Timeless Treasure
materials: 22K Gold (కంప్లీట్ బంగారం) with Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
lasting luster. Set with brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity
features: Intricate floral motif design meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The necklace features a central Emerald (పచ్చ) surrounded by a diamond halo, leading to a stunning Ruby (కెంపు) pendant adorned with cascading South Sea Pearls. Matching Jhumka style earrings are included with Ruby and pearl details. The necklace is designed with a flexible mesh style link, adding comfort and durability. The setting showcases a delicate pavé setting for maximum diamond sparkle.
colors: accented by the rich red of the Ruby
the vibrant green of the Emerald and the soft white of the pearls. A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం)
and other special occasions. Also suitable for grand receptions and festive gatherings.
description: This exquisite Haaram set is a true statement piece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and genuine gemstones ensure lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal charm. It's a heirloom-worthy piece that will be treasured for generations. The traditional motifs are considered highly auspicious, bringing prosperity and good fortune.
